name: Content grouping
description: Content grouping lets you analyze the content of your website from a logical structure that reflects the idea you have about your site, and then view and compare aggregate metrics by group name.

blocks.description: It checks if all content groups have 0 page views. in that case it shows a warning.
blocks.passMessage: Content groups measured (displayed up to 30 largest combinations of content group values)
blocks.failHowtofix: Consider using content groups. They may be set up using GTM and defining in view settings. Suitable for measuring categories in an e-shop or blog.
